nodes.text: The Kashyyyk Space Station, or simply Kashyyyk Station, was a space station under the supervision of the Civilian Protection Guild. This organization was dedicated to the defense of civilian merchants, galactic tradesmen and all legitimate space-borne businesses in the Kashyyyk system.

The Kashyyyk Space Station appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
